article.author: Justine Calma
article.title: Trump administration suspends FEMA employees who warned about disaster response
article.description: FEMA has suspended at least 30 employees after they warned that spending limits, staffing cuts, and gaps in leadership hurt the agency’s ability to respond to disasters. The employees received emails notifying them that they’d been put on administrative leave…
article.content: The letter urges Congress to take action to stop the Trump administration from dismantling FEMA and prevent another national catastrophe like Hurricane Katrina. … [+2686 chars]

article.title: Trump and the NFL - why it's complicated
article.description: After a lawsuit and many failed team bids, Donald Trump looked to have ended his 40-year feud with the NFL - but is their relationship set for another twist?

article.author: Eric Berger, Ars Technica
article.title: A Secretive US Space Plane Will Soon Test Quantum Navigation Technology
article.description: The space plane’s test flight will advance development of a new navigation technology based on electromagnetic wave interference.
article.content:
The X-37B, the US Space Forces secretive space plane, will soon take flight again.

article.title: No. 2 Swiatek struggles, but extends major streak
article.description: Iga Swiatek, the No. 2 seed, eked past Suzan Lamens at the US Open to again reach the third round, which she has done at every Slam event since the start of 2020.
article.content:
Aug 28, 2025, 03:20 PM ET
When it comes to Iga Swiatek reaching the third round of a major, you may as well put it in ink.
